problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): Both Omar Khattab and Miguel Contreras first came to the US several years ago. While Omar Khattab went through all the proper channels to get authorization to live here, Miguel Contreras had a student visa and just didn't leave after it expired about two years ago.
Question: Who lives in the country illegally?
ans0: Miguel Contreras
ans1: Undetermined
ans2: Omar Khattab
